channel.title: Half fixed
channel.description:
[s]Why does it say my server is offline when people connect using the webclient? It does this at random times, online for some people, offline for others, I can log in using the webclient, nobody else can, yesterday they were able to, and one time only 32 bit users were able to log in. What the fuck, am I getting ddosed? I also can't connect to a lot of RSPS websites, those big private servers, and RL has been down for me for the past few days, but I can go on all the other websites. This isn't just for one of my household PCs, it's for all of them. Do I request an IP change? Am I getting ddosed? What's going on :x[/s]
Well, I had to update my no-ip IP. Was pending deletion >.> Still can't figure out why sometimes people can't connect...

item.title: Half fixed
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Why does it say my server is offline when people connect using the webclient? It does this at random times, online for some people, offline for others, I can log in using the webclient, nobody else can, yesterday they were able to, and one time only 32 bit users were able to log in. What the fuck, am I getting ddosed? I also can’t connect to a lot of RSPS websites, those big private servers, and RL has been down for me for the past few days, but I can go on all the other websites. This isn’t just for one of my household PCs, it’s for all of them. Do I request an IP change? Am I getting ddosed? What’s going on :x

Well, I had to update my no-ip IP. Was pending deletion >.>
Still can’t figure out why sometimes people can’t connect…
